import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { ArrowRight, Star } from 'lucide-react'; const FeaturedProducts = () => { const featuredProducts = [ { id: 1, name: "CNC Milling Machine", category: "CNC Machines", image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1565439362994-9d5d0c0c0c0c?w=400&h=300&fit=crop", price: "$45,000", rating: 4.8, description: "High-precision CNC milling machine for industrial manufacturing" }, { id: 2, name: "Industrial Robot Arm", category: "Automation Systems", image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1565439362994-9d5d0c0c0c0c?w=400&h=300&fit=crop", price: "$32,000", rating: 4.9, description: "Advanced robotic arm for automated production lines" }, { id: 3, name: "Quality Control Scanner", category: "Quality Control", image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1565439362994-9d5d0c0c0c0c?w=400&h=300&fit=crop", price: "$18,500", rating: 4.7, description: "3D scanning system for quality assurance" } ]; return (

Featured Products

Discover our most popular machinery solutions trusted by manufacturers worldwide

{featuredProducts.map((product) => (
{product.category}

{product.name}

{product.rating}

{product.description}

{product.price} View Details
))}
View All Products
); }; export default FeaturedProducts;
